Package xyz.gmitch215.socketmc.retriever

Class Window

java.lang.Object
xyz.gmitch215.socketmc.retriever.Window
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class Window extends Object implements Serializable
Utility class to represent the client's window information.
See Also:

    • getPlatform

      public String getPlatform()

      Gets the platform this window is currently on.

      Common values are "win32", "cocoa", "wayland", and "x11". "null" will be returned if not accessible, and "<error>" will be returned if something happened.

      Returns:
      Window Platform
